DOC.brief_summary: To compare safety efficacy once-daily twice-daily celecoxib versus diclofenac treatment ankylose spondylitis
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Celecoxib Versus Diclofenac Treatment Ankylosing Spondylitis
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis ankylose spondylitis define accord modified New York criterion , axial involvement Requiring daily treatment nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug previous 30 day Patients inflammatory enterophathy , extraarticular manifestation Patients know vertebral compression Received corticosteroid 6 week prior baseline visit ; patient stable dose prednisolone equivalent â‰¤ 10 mg/ day least 14 day randomization permit
